title: Samsung Innovation Campus certifies 2,000 youth in Karnataka
description: Samsung Innovation Campus certifies 2,000 students in Bengaluru, enhancing skills in Artificial Intelligence and Coding for future employability.
content:
Samsung, global consumer electronics brand, on Thursday said it certified 2,000 students in Bengaluru under its flagship Samsung Innovation Campus (SIC) programme, as part of the company’s efforts to build a future-ready talent pool in Karnataka.
